laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal except for a slightly elevated ocular tension at 19 torr bilaterally.
Binasal hemianopia with normal visual acuity and ocular tension.
Normal visual fields according to Humphrey testing, normal macula and optic disks, stable visual acuity and ocular tension.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient's visual field deficits improved within the first 48 hours after surgery.
